bookSourceComment: 增加保存重定向后的域名到源变量，搜索时使用重定向后的域名进行搜索。 换源url时，先在右上角三个点 设置源变量里清空源变量再换源url。 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.6yydstxt226.com/ https://www.6yydstxt434.com/ https://www.6yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt234.com/ https://www.5yydstxt178.com/

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
//状态
novelState = [
	{	title: '全部', type: 0},
	{	title: '连载', type: 1},
	{	title: '完结', type: 2}
]
//分类
novelSort = [
	{	title: '　全部　', type: 0},
	{	title: '玄幻奇幻', type: 1},
	{	title: '仙侠武侠', type: 2},
	{	title: '都市言情', type: 3},
	{	title: '穿越历史', type: 4},
	{	title: '科幻灵异', type: 5},
	{	title: '  藏经阁  ', type: 6},
	{	title: '其他类别', type: 7}
]
//排序
novelRank = [
	{ title: '  更新  ', type: 'lastupdate'},
	{ title: '总人气', type: 'allvisit'},
	{ title: '月人气', type: 'monthvisit'},
	{ title: '  字数  ', type: 'size'},
	{ title: '  新书  ', type: 'postdate'}
]

list = [];
formatUrl = (sort, rank, state) => {
	return `{{eval(String(source.loginUrl));_getUrl();}}shuku/${sort}-${rank}-${state}-{{page}}.html`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (stateItem of novelState) {
	pushItem(`🚫小说状态---${stateItem.title}🚫`, "", 1);
	for (rankItem of novelRank) {
		novelSort[0].title = "📫" + rankItem.title;
		for (sortItem of novelSort) {
			pushItem(`${sortItem.title}`, formatUrl(sortItem.type, rankItem.type, stateItem.type), sortItem.type > 5 ? 0.45 : 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>
header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
$.lastChapter
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: $.title

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

制作 酷安@靈狐

使用新方式处理跳转详情页

ruleSearch.author: td.2@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
// 验证码处理 v2 by 酷安@靈狐
// 使用腾讯OCR请设置tx_cookie
// 腾讯OCR有次数限制
// 登录地址https://cloud.tencent.com/login?s_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcloud.tencent.com%2Fproduct%2Focr
// 如果获取不到相关cookie就上传图片识别

// 代码最佳运行环境是在书籍列表页
// 移植其他地方可能会出现bug
// 如果搜索会跳转详情页请完善书籍URL正则
// 滑到最下面传入参数需要更改

var ocr=true // 是否启用ocr，关闭后手动输入，对于手动输入请开启CookieJar或在请求头手动设置一个cookie（部分网站不适用）
var mode=0
/*
0:"百度_通用"
1:"百度_高精度
2:"百度_网络图片"
3:"腾讯_通用"
4:"腾讯_高精度"
5:"腾讯_手写"
6:"腾讯_英语"
*/
var save=false // 是否缓存验证码供多次使用

var toast_level=2
/*
	0:关闭toast弹窗
	1:显示错误消息
	2:显示全部
*/

var tx_cookie={
	'uin':'',
	'skey':'',
}
var header=source.header||''
header=JSON.parse(header!=''?header:'{}')
function concat(o,split){
	let result=''
	for(i in o){
		let v=o[i]
		v=v&&'='+java.encodeURI(v)||''
		result+=result==''&&i+v||split+i+v
	}
	return result
}
tx_cookie=String(concat(tx_cookie,';'))
var Ocr={
tencent:function(base64,mode){
	let extra,params,action,data,body,res,json
	extra={
	 "LanguageType":"en",
		//"IsPdf":true,
		"ImageBase64":"data:image/jpeg;base64,"+base64
	}
 params={
		"ToModule":"ocr",
		"Extra":JSON.stringify(extra)
	}
 action=[
  'GeneralBasicOCR',
  'GeneralAccurateOCR',
  'GeneralHandwritingOCR',
  'EnglishOCR'
 ]
 params.ToAction=action[mode||0]
 body=JSON.stringify(params)
 data={
		"Action":"OcrDemo",
		"CloudEnv":"Formal",
		"Region":"ap-guangzhou",
		"Params":JSON.stringify(params)
		}
	body=JSON.stringify(data)
	res=java.post('https://ocr.smartform.cloud.tencent.com/ocr/forward/cloud',body,{cookie:tx_cookie})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body()).Response
		data=json.Data
		let result=''
		if(data){
			json=JSON.parse(data).Response.TextDetections
			for(i in json){
				result+=json[i].DetectedText
			}
		}else{
			this.msg=json.Error.Message
		}
		return result
},
baidu:function(base64,mode){
	let data,body,type,url,res,json
	data={
		image:'data:image/jpeg;base64,'+base64,
		image_url:null,
		type:'https://aip.baidubce.com/rest/2.0/ocr/v1/',
		detect_direction:false,
		language_type:'ENG'
		}
		type=[
		 'general_basic',
		 'accurate_basic',
		 'webimage'
		]
		data.type=data.type+type[mode||0]
		body=concat(data,'&')
		let result=''
		url='https://ai.baidu.com/aidemo'
		res=java.post(url,body,{'referer':url})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body())
		if(json.errno==0){
		 json=json.data.words_result
		 for(i in json){
			 result+=json[i].words
		 }
		}else{
			this.msg=json.msg
		}
		return result
},
get:function(base64){
	let result
 if(mode<3){
 	 result=this.baidu(base64,mode)
 	}else{
 		result=this.tencent(base64,mode-3)
 	}
 	if(this.msg){
 		java.log(this.msg)
 		if(toast_level>0){
 			java.toast(this.msg)
 		}
 		this.msg=null
 	}
 return result
 }
}
function imgToBase64(imgUrl){
	let res=org.jsoup.Jsoup.connect(imgUrl).ignoreContentType(true).ignoreHttpErrors(true).execute()
	header['cookie']=String(concat(res.cookies(),';'))
	let base64=Packages.cn.hutool.core.codec.Base64.encode(res.bodyAsBytes())
	return base64
}
function Url(u){
	if(!u.match('^http')){
		u = source.key+'/'+u
	}
	u = u.match(/(https?:\/\/)(.+)/)
	u = u[1]+u[2].replace(/\/+/,'/')
	return u
}
function auto(o){
	let base64,yzm,msg,body,res
	if(save&&try_times==0){
		yzm=cache.get(Url('yzm'))
		let temp=cache.get(Url('cookie'))
		if(temp){
		 header.cookie=temp
		}
	}
	if(!yzm){
	 if(ocr){
	  base64=imgToBase64(Url(o.img))
	  yzm=Ocr.get(base64).replace(/[^\w]/g,'')
	  if(yzm!==''){
	   msg='识别验证码：'+yzm
	   java.log(msg)
	   if(toast_level>1){
	    java.toast(msg)
	   }
	  }
	 }else{
		 yzm=java.getVerificationCode(Url(o.img))
		 let t=cookie.getCookie(source.key)
		 if(t&&t!=''){
		 	 header.cookie=t
		 	}
	 }
	}
	cache.delete(Url('yzm'))
	cache.delete(Url('cookie'))
	if(save){
		cache.put(Url('yzm'),yzm)
		cache.put(Url('cookie'),header.cookie)
	}
	for(i in o.data){
		if(!o.data||o.data[i]==''){
			o.data[i]=yzm
		}
	}
	body=concat(o.data,'&')
	method=o.method.toLowerCase()
	if(method=='post'){
	 res=java.post(Url(o.action),body,header)
	}else{
		res=java.get(Url(o.action+'/?')+body,header)
	}
	let jump=res.header("Location")
	jump=jump&&Url(jump)
 if(jump){
  	// 主要用在动态获取更新html，不需要可直接
  	// result='验证码'
 	 result=java.ajax(jump)
 	 // 该判断用在搜索列表规则时处理搜索跳转详情页
	 if(jump.match(source.bookUrlPattern)){
		 java.put('src',result)
		 source.bookUrlPattern=''
		 info=source.bookInfoRule.init
		 tocUrl=source.bookInfoRule.tocUrl
		 js="<"+"js>book.setBookUrl('"+jump+"');java.get('src')</"+"js>"
		 source.bookInfoRule.init=js+info
		 if(!tocUrl||tocUrl==''){
		 	 source.bookInfoRule.tocUrl="@js:'"+jump+"'"
		 	}
		 //toc=source.tocRule.chapterList
		 //source.tocRule.chapterList=js+toc
		 result=''
	 }
 }else{
 	 result=res.body()
 	}
	return result
}
max_try=5
try_times=0
while(result.match('验证码')){
 img=java.getString('img@src')
 input=java.getElement('input')
 data={}
 for([i,node] of Object.entries(input)){
		data[node.attr('name')]=node.attr('value')
	}
	u=java.getString('form@action')
 result=auto({
  action:u,
	 method:'post',
	 img:img,
	 data:data
	})
	// 设置解析为新的html
	java.setContent(result)
	/*上面是动态获取例子，以下是手动填入例子
	auto({
		action:"gut.php", // 提交数据地址
		method:'post', // 提交方式
		img:'captcha.php', // 验证码图片
		data:{ // 提交参数键值对
			search:'系统', // 搜索关键字
			captcha:'' // 识别为空的关键字为验证码
	 }
	})
	搜索关键字不从网页获取就用java.put('key',key)和java.get('key')
	已经很简单了，再不会打屁屁
	*/
if(try_times>=max_try){break}
try_times+=1
}
result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?)'/)[1]
tocData=java.get(source.key+toc,{referer:String(s.url)}).body()
if(!tocData||tocData==''){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	tocData=JSON.parse(tocData)
 tocData=tocData.oridata||tocData.data
 tocData=tocData.split('-//-').map(v=>{v=v.split('-/-');return {i:v[0],cid:v[1],title:v[2],vip:v[3]}})
 if(s.host=='uukanshu')tocData.reverse()
 java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title)
 java.put('toc',toc)
 java.put('tocData',JSON.stringify(tocData))
}
result
</js>.container

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

20231123 整体修复-尐哖
旧域名：https://api.aixdzs.com
exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent##伱##你

s=page>1?'&page='+page:'';	body="_token="+token+"&kw="+key+s;
	head={"cookie":cs}
	post={
		"method": "POST",
		"body":body,
		"headers":head
	}
u+"/search/,"+JSON.stringify(post)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{

function fonts(font){
	  //拼接完整字体链接
	  url = book.origin+font;
	  //java.log(url)
	  //解析网站的字体
    var f1 = java.queryTTF(url);
    var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://d.kstore.space/download/5478/Regular.ttf");
    return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
}
	   //获取字体链接
	  var font = java.get("zt")
	  font=font?font:null;
	  //java.log(font)

<js>
	var data = JSON.parse( result ).data;
	var pageSize = data.comments.length;
	var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; 
	var list = [];

	for(var i = 0; i < pageCount; i++){
 	 var index = i+1;
    var tt = '第' + index +'页 ' + java.get("s")+'分 ' + java.get("sc") +'人 '+java.get("ut");
  list[i] = {
  	title: String(tt).replace(/页 (\d)(\d)/, '页 $1.$2' ).replace(/\.\d+?人/, '人' ).replace(/T.+/, '' ), 
		url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}

list;
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.author: h2.0@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
time=java.getString('meta[property=og:novel:update_time]@content')
java.put('time',time)
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
pay=result.match(/" vip"/)
pay&&java.put('pay',pay[0])
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=source.key+result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?list.*?)'/)[1]+',{"headers":{"referer":"'+s.url+'"}}'
java.put('toc',toc)
cache.delete(toc)
tocData=getTocData()
if(!tocData){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title+'·'+time)
}
result
</js>.container

<js>
h = String(source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1]);
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = String(source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1]);
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}

h

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}

.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')

.replace(/\[|。/,'')

bookSourceComment:
/*同站一大堆
修复搜索，可设置源变量限制搜索数量
优化by:游客2580
搜索加载by:Thomas&&youke2580
同类型网站可以自行替换网址*/
bookSourceGroup: 源仓库,修复优化,整理检验,自制,网页源

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

variableComment:
输入数字设置搜索列表数量，过大无效。
1为1个，2为2个，3为3个，以此类推。
不设置或0清空显示全部列表。

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{chapter.title}}|\(第.*页\)|（本章未完.*继续阅读）|阅读.*最新章节.*请关注.+

ruleSearch.author: a@ownText##.*[(]|[):]|[【】].+
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>
.bd li
ruleSearch.name: a@ownText##[()].+|.*[:【]|】

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
d=java.getElements(".list div");
var li="";
for(i in d){
	li+=d.select(`[data-id=${i}] li`);
	li+="\n";
	}
	li;
</js>
li a

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
(function(){
	   //匹配字体链接
	  var font = src.match(/\.woff2\), url\((.*?.ttf)\);/)[1];
	  //java.log(font)
	  //拼接完整字体链接
	  url = book.origin+font;
	  //java.log(url)
	  //解析网站的字体
    var f1 = java.queryTTF(url);
    var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://d.kstore.space/download/5478/Regular.ttf");
    return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
})()
</js>

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

\n?){2}/g,"

'); result = ""; for (i = 1; i <= paragraphArr.length; i++) { result += paragraphArr[ns[i] - ns[0]] + '

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/[\r\n]?[\t ]*]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t  ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "
